Oversized Sales Bags

  • Combo Bags
  • CPS Bag
  • Sales Bags 32-40
  • Top Loading Catheter Bag
  • Travel Bag

When you need to carry a large amount of supplies/products but do not want to use several separate bags, look no further than this bag set. You can connect a piggyback bag, which can hold all of your long devices/products, to one of our rolling bags. Attach a piggyback bag to a rolling bag or use them separately. All piggyback bags come with a padded shoulder strap and grab handle. All of the oversized bags come with our heavy-duty wheel system.

Combine two of our most popular oversized bag styles for one bag set.
